com.glebcorp.terminal

Class Terminal

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.glebcorp.terminal.Terminal

  • public class Terminal
extends java.lang.Object
     Extensible embeddable terminal to be used for advanced tests
 Example usage :
 
 final Terminal calc = new Terminal();
 calc.addCommands(new Command("add", Args.NUMBER, "and", Args.NUMBER) {
      @Override
     public void call() {
         System.out.println(getInt(0) + getInt(1));
     }
 }, new Command("exit") {
      @Override
     public void call() {
     calc.stop();
     }
 });
 calc.start(System.in);
    Version:
    0.3.0
    Author:
    Glebbash

      • process

        public boolean process(java.lang.String command)
        Call to manually process command. If command is not processed calls default command
        Parameters:
        command - to process
        Returns:
        true if command is processed, else otherwise
        See Also:
        setDefaultCommand
